Verses: 1 pelisthar Isravelarode Yuththampanninaargal; Isravel Pelistharukku Munbaaga Murindhodi, Kilpovaa Malaiyile Vettundu Vizhundhaargal.
2 pelisthar Savulaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Nerungith Thodarndhu, Savulin Kumaararaagiya Yonaththaanaiyum, Abinadhaabaiyum, Malkisoovaavaiyum Vettippottaargal.
3 savulukku Virodhamaai Yuththam Balaththadhu; Vilveerar Avanaikkandu Nerunginaargal; Appozhudhu Savul Vilveerarukku Migavum Bayappattu,

4 than Aayudhadhaariyai Nokki: Andha Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavargal Vandhu Ennai Avamaanappaduththaadhapadikku, Nee Un Pattayaththai Uruvi, Ennaik Kuththippodu Endraan; Avanudaiya Aayudhadhaari Migavum Bayappattadhinaal Appadichcheyyamaatten Endraan. Appozhudhu Savul Pattayaththai Nattu Adhinmel Vizhundhaan.
5 savul Seththupponadhai Avan Aayudhadhaari Kandapodhu, Avanum Pattayaththinmel Vizhundhu Seththupponaan.
6 appadiye Savulum, Avan Moondrukumaararum, Avan Veettu Manushar Anaivarumkooda Seththupponaargal.

7 janangal Murindhodinadhaiyum, Savulum Avan Kumaararum Seththupponadhaiyum, Pallaththaakkilulla Isravelar Ellaarum Kandapodhu Thangal Pattanangalai Vittu Odipponaargal; Appozhudhu Pelisthar Vandhu, Avaigalil Kudiyirundhaargal
8 vettundavargalin Vasthirangalai Urindhukollap Pelisthar Marunaalil Vandhapodhu, Avargal Savulaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Kilpovaa Malaiyile Vizhundhukidakkak Kandu,

9 avan Vasthirangalai Urindhu, Avan Thalaiyaiyum Avan Aayudhangalaiyum Eduththukkondu, Thangal Vikkiragangalukkum Janangalukkum Adhaip Prasiththappaduththumpadi Pelistharudaiya Dhesaththile Sutrilum Seydhi Anuppi,
10 avan Aayudhangalaith Thangal Dhevargalin Kovilile Vaiththu, Avan Thalaiyaith Thaagon Kovilile Thookkivaiththaargal.
11 pelisthar Savulukku Seydha Ellaavatraiyun Keeleyaa Dhesaththu Yaabes Pattanaththaar Yaavarum Kettapodhu,

12 paraakkiramasaaligal Ellaarum Ezhundhupoi, Savulin Udalaiyum Avan Kumaararin Udalgalaiyum Eduththu, Yaabesukkuk Konduvandhu, Avargal Elumbugalai Yaabesilirukkira Oru Karvaalimaraththinkeezh Adakkampanni, Ezhunaal Ubavaasampanninaargal.

13 appadiye Savul Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kaikkollaamal, Karththarukku Seydha Than Dhrogaththinimiththamum, Avan Karththaraith Thedaamal Anjanam Paarkkiravargalaik Ketkumpadikkuth Thedinadhinimiththamum Seththupponaan.
14 adharkaaga Avar Avanaik Kondru, Raajyabaaraththai Eesaayin Kumaaranaagiya Dhaaveedhu Vasamaagak Thiruppinaar.
